values: John Rich: Donald Trump, the Darkness of Eminem’s New Album, and the Song He Wrote Through God

One of the most downloaded songs in America is about the book of Revelation. John Rich says he channeled the entire thing from God.

(00:00) John Rich’s Song Inspired by God

(33:33) The Attacks on Christianity
